Background:
Indra, one of the twelve divine commanders who guarded the East and Southeast, 
 and is the chief priest of 'Jingu Gu shrine.' It is possible to deal with the special ability that can be poisoned poison to the partner who touches it,
 and it is possible to exert the effect as a medicine by the addition of poison. In addition, it is the owner of the character which dislikes the free time by the work,
 and it doesn't have to sleep only for 12 days now because it puts importance on the efficiency,
 and it seems to be doing work besides the island of the It seems to be interested in the journey of the main character who receives the request in various islands...
Background_JP:
南南東の恵方を守護する十二神将のひとりにして「巳神宮」の主であるインダラ。
触れた相手に毒を染み込ませられる特殊な能力を扱うことができ、毒の加減によっては薬としての効果を発揮させることも可能です。
また、仕事一筋で暇を嫌う性格の持ち主で、効率を重視するあまり今では12日間寝ずにいられるようになっただけでなく、巳神宮のある島以外にも赴いて仕事をこなしているようです。
様々な島で依頼を受けている主人公の旅路にも興味があるようですが……？
